protein.specific_function: Phosphorylates serines and threonines, but also appears to possess tyrosine kinase activity. Implicated in the control of meiosis

reference.reference_text: Nagase T, Kikuno R, Ohara O: Prediction of the coding sequences of unidentified human genes. XXI. The complete sequences of 60 new cDNA clones from brain which code for large proteins. DNA Res. 2001 Aug 31;8(4):179-87.
